subject: Indian Polity
topic: Panchayati Raj aur Nagariya Swashasan (73rd & 74th Amendment)
question_en: What is the significance of the 73rd and 74th Amendments in India's local self-government structure?
question_hi: राजभाषाओं और नगर पालनकारी के 73rd और 74th संविधान का अध्ययन क्या राजभाषाओं और नगर पालनकारी के माध्यम के सामर्थ्य क्या है?
A_en: The 73rd Amendment enhances the power of the states regarding local self-government.
A_hi: 73rd संविधान के माध्यम के माध्यम क्या है?
B_en: The 74th Amendment ensures the inclusion of Scheduled Castes and Scheduled Tribes in local self-government.
B_hi: 74th संविधान के माध्यम के माध्यम क्या है?
C_en: The 73rd Amendment enhances the powers of municipalities.
D_en: The 74th Amendment ensures the establishment of Gram Panchayats.
E_en: The 73rd Amendment emphasizes the involvement of local bodies in rural development.
F_en: The 74th Amendment ensures reservation for SC/ST in local bodies.
F_hi: 74सा संविधान के माध्यम के माध्यम क्या है?
